Product title: Titanker Shower Curtain Hooks Chrome, Minimalist Simple Double Glide Shower Curtain Rings, Rust Proof Metal Shower Hooks Rings for Bathroom Shower Rods Curtains, Set of 12 Hooks
Key Features: Double hooks design - The double roller glide shower curtain hooks are strong enough to hold up shower curtain and shower liner. | Minimalist design - no ball bearing gliding, less jamming and noise annoyance. The minimalist shape shower hooks blend seamlessly into any bathroom style. | High quality metal - These double glided shower curtain rings are made of high quality and selected metal. These shower curtain hooks are 3 inches long and fits most standard size shower curtain rods (less than or equal to 1.3 inches). | Plated & polished - Coating is plated and polished on cover of double sided shower rings to be used as elegant decor to your bathroom. | Set of 12 - Sold as a set of 12 shower curtain rings. Titanker shower curtain hooks meets most of quantity demands for one usual bathroom.
comment 1: I love these. They are pleasant to look at and very easy to use. One hook holds shower liner and shower curtain. Makes it very easy to remove either one for washing. Nice quality, holds well and slides easy. I'd buy them again. - KathyF
comment 2: love the easy way i can hook the decorative shower curtain on one side, and the plastic curtain on the other. It will not rip or tear the plastic. slides easily on the shower rod. does not come off the shower rod. has not rusted yet - Vivien Garber
comment 3: Perfect weight and thickness. Good quality. Standard size for regular shower bar. Ease of opening package, including hanging on the shower bar. Makes it very easy to hang, wash, and replace both the shower curtain or the liner. Very happy with the purchase. Excellent value for the money! - DangriestOnE
comment 4: They’re not bad - especially for the price - but they will eventually rust.  I’m about to replace them.  Here is a picture of them after about a year and a half of daily shower exposure.  I’m just going to buy the same ones because I love how easily I can change the liner and curtain. - Jaime Carter
